ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | gsumdifsnd.b | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | gsumdifsnd.p | |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) |
| 3 |  | gsumdifsnd.g | |- ( ph -> G e. CMnd ) |
| 4 |  | gsumdifsnd.a | |- ( ph -> A e. W ) |
| 5 |  | gsumdifsnd.f | |- ( ph -> ( k e. A |-> X ) finSupp ( 0g ` G ) ) |
| 6 |  | gsumdifsnd.e | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> X e. B ) |
| 7 |  | gsumdifsnd.m | |- ( ph -> M e. A ) |
| 8 |  | gsumdifsnd.y | |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) |
| 9 |  | gsumdifsnd.s | |- ( ( ph /\ k = M ) -> X = Y ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 0g ` G ) = ( 0g ` G ) |
| 11 |  | #P_difid | |- ( { M } \ { M } ) = (/) |
| 12 | 7 | #P_snssd | |- ( ph -> { M } C_ A ) |
| 13 |  | #P_difin2 | |- ( { M } C_ A -> ( { M } \ { M } ) = ( ( A \ { M } ) i^i { M } ) ) |
| 14 | 12, 13 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( { M } \ { M } ) = ( ( A \ { M } ) i^i { M } ) ) |
| 15 | 11, 14 | #P_syl5reqr | |- ( ph -> ( ( A \ { M } ) i^i { M } ) = (/) ) |
| 16 |  | #P_difsnid | |- ( M e. A -> ( ( A \ { M } ) u. { M } ) = A ) |
| 17 | 7, 16 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( ( A \ { M } ) u. { M } ) = A ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_eqcomd | |- ( ph -> A = ( ( A \ { M } ) u. { M } ) ) |
| 19 | 1, 10, 2, 3, 4, 6, 5, 15, 18 | #P_gsumsplit2 | |- ( ph -> ( G gsum ( k e. A |-> X ) ) = ( ( G gsum ( k e. ( A \ { M } ) |-> X ) ) .+ ( G gsum ( k e. { M } |-> X ) ) ) ) |
| 20 |  | #P_cmnmnd | |- ( G e. CMnd -> G e. Mnd ) |
| 21 | 3, 20 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> G e. Mnd ) |
| 22 | 1, 21, 7, 8, 9 | #P_gsumsnd | |- ( ph -> ( G gsum ( k e. { M } |-> X ) ) = Y ) |
| 23 | 22 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ph -> ( ( G gsum ( k e. ( A \ { M } ) |-> X ) ) .+ ( G gsum ( k e. { M } |-> X ) ) ) = ( ( G gsum ( k e. ( A \ { M } ) |-> X ) ) .+ Y ) ) |
| 24 | 19, 23 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ph -> ( G gsum ( k e. A |-> X ) ) = ( ( G gsum ( k e. ( A \ { M } ) |-> X ) ) .+ Y ) ) |
